title: Possible ways to Fix Zed
body:
Hey guys, Zed is really in the gutters right now sitting at a[ 45% winrat](https://champion.gg/champion/Zed/Middle?league=)e t'll 25-30 mins and could really use a buff especially in high elo 

Ideas for Zed buffs

**Make him better at poking or better at all-in. If we can't have that then make him a lategame scaling assassin** 


**keep in mind you don't have to do all of these buffs only some, i've organized these ideas in sections for the different paths you can take to fix zed** 
**
All-In Buffs:

- E shreds 10% total pen per hit caps 30 or 25% 
- deathmark applies armor debuff on target 10/20/30 

Poke Buffs: 

- W cd lowered to 18 sec 
- Q buff
- Q does +50% more damage to minions or Q does full 80% damage passthough on champions but 50% on minions 

Lategame Buffs:

- passive reworked to utility passive like gain movespeed while unseen based on %of bonus AD with buffs to his E and Q to make up for the lost dmg 
- Reaping passive stacks with a cap. 7 AD per kill caps at 70, targets who are higher level reap more, 1lvl difference = 14 ad reap. 2 lvl diff = 21 
- snapback delay lowered with each point ( 0.5 at 6 / 0.25 at 11/ 0 at 16 ) 
- getting a kill with R lowers his cooldowns by 15sec 


Interesting buffs:

- When zed swaps with a shadow he gains additional auto attack range and damage on hit
- W Shadow's E now counts towards W reset
- When zed ults a target he lands in the direction of his mouse, not behind his enemies
- E marks a champion, Q procs on champ to deal bonus damage and reduce w cd 



Problem with Zed is his All-In is too weak to warrant how shitty his poke is. Riot once nerfed Zed because they said his poek and all-in were too strong which created a catch 22 where its either lose lane by getting poked out of lane or stay long enough for zed to just kill you. Currently we have the exactly opposite where we can't poke enemies out of lane and we can't all in either so we just get fucked!  

Even faker says all zed can do in lane is just push waves!!!

hi i can tell youre a very good player what thing im concerned with is down here in low elo (probably plat to bronze) when gets played hes dominating a lot ... can i ask why in high elo hes conisdered weak but in low hes the opposite? 

when i face him i have trouble dealing with his poke and his W E Q electrocute trade .... i wouldnt mind him being scaling champion though but as it stands im struggling to understand why hes considered weak ? i know he is but i dont get why? so can you possible shed some light :)

Cause people in low elo will rush damage against him, they dont abuse the fact that they have 22 seconds of time when they can harass the shit out of him.

People in lower elo also dont care  that hes a melee champ(If i play Syndra i walk up and i harass/poke Zed really hard from lvl 1 to 3,after that i wait until he uses his poke, then i walk up again.)

He's considered weak in high elo because opponents actually know how to play the game.

Zed dominates low elo because people don't understand what Zhonya's, GA and armor is.

Nor do they understand mechanics like Vision.

when you have tabs and chain vets at 14 min and zed 100-0 without ult with 3 kills

High elo be like "build more armor"

> [{quoted}](name=Marian Cross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HIiJwgkc,comment-id=000800020000,timestamp=2018-12-01T07:43:09.978+0000)

LOL that's what they do and the reason why Zed mains cry in high elo. If you visit r/Zedmains subreddit, you can see that almost everyone is complaining how garbage he is and how little damage he deals because too many mages cuck him with armor lol

The trick for dealing with Zed is to buy this item called seeker’s armguard. If you buy it then zed will be instantly useless. You can upgrade it later to zhonyas hourglass to make him even more useless.

But then YOU are useless because you got Seeker's just to defend against his bullshit poke first and therefore don't have the damage or mana to farm or poke him back.

See why mages struggle?

-.-

AD champs have the same problem, this is not a mage specific issue. I could say the same with maw, "But then YOU are useless because you got Maw just to defend against X's bullshit poke first therefore and don't have the damage or mana to farm or poke him back". You make seekers sound like a waste of gold when it allows you to win a lot more trades and be less susceptible to burst. This is a stupid argument.
Same here. It feels bad to dodge a combo every 20 seconds only to be hit by one successful combo and lose 50% of your HP.

~~Am I doing it right?~~
alright 45% win rate...so does akali need buffs? She sits at 43-44.
The winrate did not get a reset after her Rework if you get her Number After the Rework then we can Discuss this further my friend
That website according to my understanding does win rates by patch...In fact this patch she is at 43% overall. Zed sits at...48.5 or so.

the difference is that Akali is permabanned, even in high elo and pro play

while zed isn't

Guys can you wake up ? the 48-49% winrate you're talking about is from bronze to diamond.

Once you get to higher elo(like d2) the enemy midlaner will just rush tabi's or armseekers, making Zed fucking useless.

In higher elo they also know how to abuse Zed. (He is a melee champion, 22 seconds of vulnerability after using weq to poke)

EDIT: Also if you want him to make less oppresive in lower elos and better in higher elos, rework his passive to something that needs skill in order to be applied, this way the skill rewards players that can maximalise the use of the passive(More likely to happen in higher elo.)and will not reward Zed players that can't use it(more likely to happen in lower elo.)
he is not talking about giving all the buffs only some of them
Yes eating turkey with ketchup and mustard indeed buffs your zed gameplay.

There is not much difference between a bad zed player and a skilled one as he is way too easy to play with the amount of tools he have.
Remove his last hit assistance passive.
Replace with a new passive that increasingly shreds armor with successive skill hits.
This will fix the problems in with zed in low elo and high elo.
Its way too easy to reach the state where he has too much waveclear that allows him to free roam to make plays.

This is actually a really good idea, but I’d rather his passive scale with AD and give him better ratios that encourage the use of AD builds over lethality. Lethality is just a terrible stat which is easily countered.

if he wants to push then he has to use his w, which again makes him vulnerable for 20 seconds again


There's no way a Zed can outpush you if you play as a champ with some waveclear atleast ( Syndra, Xerath, Talon, Aatrox etc.)

Yes, there is a difference between a bad and a good Zed player. A massive difference in fact. Zed is very hard despite the amount of tools he has, how he utilises them is extremely important.

The passive change is a healthy idea though, but his passive isn't why his waveclear is good. However, he is out wavecleared by many mages and in the assassin category by Tiamat Talon.
To everyone crying about how the win rate "isn't bad" well Zeds win rate is inflated by 1 tricks

You're... You're joking, right? Zed is a high skill cap champion, he shouldn't have a high win rate until you learn him. He doesn't need any buffs right now, he's already plenty strong if you know how to use the champion.

While my comment got deleted for 2nd pretense sarcasm, I'll have to go serious mode.

Zed doesn't need nerfs nor buffs.
It's the items that are the problems.
I remember back then before the existence of lethality, I didn't die from a Zed missing 3/4 of his abilities, it was the exact opposite when his build use to be {{item:3071}} {{item:3153}} etc.

I use to enjoy playing a Zed even as a mage main. But with the lethality items, he's unfun due to how unbalanced he became and even less to no skills.

btw ofc elo does matter he plays zed more than any1 and he plays him in high elo ofc he knows whats optimun and zeds state.

I agree, finally some one who speaks up against the brutal treatment Zed has been receiving from riot, His gameplay doesn't fit his theme well, if some of this changes would be applied his kit and theme would be more appealing to both new and veteran players
